sentences.english: Fletcher is a similarly conscientious character.
sentences.chinese: 弗萊徹的風格也是類似，踢得兢兢業業。

sentences.english: He shows great assiduity in all his work.
sentences.chinese: 他對所有工作都兢兢業業。

sentences.english: And he workedhard as a New York City firefighter.
sentences.chinese: 作爲紐約市一名消防員，丹尼斯工作兢兢業業。

sentences.english: For decades, he has been cautious and conscientious towards work.
sentences.chinese: 幾十年來，他對工作一直兢兢業業，一絲不苟。

definition: making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy/steady and serious character
obscure and unknown (idiom); an outsider without any reputation/a nobody/an unknown quantity
to spare no pains or effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
to be dedicated to one's work/to respect one's work
not one thread loose (idiom); strictly according to the rules/meticulous/not one hair out of place
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
to set an example (idiom); to serve as a model
